statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -5 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
